code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useSearchParams}from'react-router-dom';import ProductCard from'../components/ProductCard';import{productsData}from'../data/products';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchPage=()=>{const[searchParams]=useSearchParams();const[searchResults,setSearchResults]=useState([]);const query=searchParams.get('q')||'';useEffect(()=>{if(query.trim()){const searchTerms=query.toLowerCase().split(/\s+/);const filteredProducts=productsData.filter(product=>{const productName=product.name.toLowerCase();return searchTerms.every(term=>productName.includes(term));});setSearchResults(filteredProducts);}else{setSearchResults([]);}},[query]);if(!query.trim()){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"main-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"main-title",children:"B\xFAsqueda"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"main-description",children:"Ingresa un t\xE9rmino de b\xFAsqueda para encontrar productos."})]});}if(searchResults.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"main-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"main-title",style:{fontSize:'1rem',textTransform:'none'},children:["No se han encontrado resultados para \"",query,"\""]})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"main-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"main-title",style:{fontSize:'1rem',textTransform:'none'},children:["Resultados para \"",query,"\""]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"products-container",children:searchResults.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductCard,{product:product},product.id))})]});};export default SearchPage;
